meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of flakes
meanings.sent1: The old painting had a flakey surface, with paint peeling off in small pieces.
meanings.sent2: The pastry was flakey and delicious, just like grandma used to make.
meanings.sent3: The flakey snow on the ground made it look like a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was so dry and flakey, it felt like sandpaper.
meanings.sent5: The artist created a stunning portrait using flakey gold leaf for texture.
